name: Run! Soap-kun!
description:
I started out with the concept that the soap escapes from the store and cleans the dirty uncle.

However, the excuse of graduation thesis was combined and the theme was just to escape from the store.
Emphasis was placed on making the operation as intuitive as possible.

****************

 The file contains readmeJP and readmeEG. The readmeEG is listed below.

****************

Work homepage
https://scrapbox.io/yutateno/%E6%BB%91%E3%82%8C%EF%BC%81%E7%9F%B3%E9%B9%B8%E3%81...

_About this game
A 2D avoidance game.

_Starting method
With the Xbox controller connected.

_Basic operation
[xbox controller]
A: Decision / Jump
B: Cancel / Skip
RB: Acceleration
BACK & START: End of game
